Fraction of heterozygous variants
                                          that could be phased.

bp_per_block_avg.title: Avg bp per Block
bp_per_block_avg.description:
Description of the distribution of non-singleton
                                        block lengths, where the length of a block is the
                                        number of base pairs it covers minus 1. That is, a
                                        block with two variants at positions 2 and 5 has
                                        length 3.

block_n50.title: NG50
block_n50.description:
The NG50 value of the distribution of the block
                                        lengths. Interleaved blocks are cut in order to
                                        avoid artificially inflating this value.

error_sex_check.description: Displays False if error in sample sex prediction

dconfig.title:
WhatsHap: Phased Basepairs per Sample
3 samples

title.text:
WhatsHap: Phased Basepairs per Sample
3 samples

whatshap-variants.title: Input Variants
whatshap-variants.description:
Number of biallelic variants in the input VCF, but
                                        excluding any non-SNV variants if --only-snvs was
                                        used

whatshap-heterozygous_variants.title: Heterozygous Variants
whatshap-heterozygous_variants.description:
The number of biallelic, heterozygous variants in
                                        the input VCF. This is a subset of Input Variants.

whatshap-heterozygous_snvs.title: Heterozygous SNVs
whatshap-heterozygous_snvs.description:
The number of biallelic, heterozygous SNVs in the
                                        input VCF. This is a subset of Heterozygous
                                        Variants.

whatshap-unphased.title: Unphased Variants
whatshap-unphased.description:
The number of biallelic, heterozygous variants that
                                        are not marked as phased in the input VCF. This
                                        is a subset of heterozygous_variants.

whatshap-phased.title: Phased Variants
whatshap-phased.description:
The number of biallelic, heterozygous variants that
                                        are marked as phased in the input VCF. This is
                                        a subset of heterozygous_variants. Also, phased +
                                        unphased + singletons = heterozygous_variants.

whatshap-phased_snvs.title: Phased SNVs
whatshap-phased_snvs.description:
The number of biallelic, heterozygous SNVs that are
                                        marked as phased in the input VCF. This is a subset
                                        of phased.

whatshap-blocks.title: Blocks
whatshap-blocks.description: The total number of phase sets/blocks.

whatshap-singletons.title: Singletons
whatshap-singletons.description: The number of blocks that contain exactly one variant.

whatshap-bp_per_block_sum.title: Total Phased bp
whatshap-bp_per_block_sum.description:
The sum of the lengths of all non-singleton
                                        blocks, where the length of a block is the
                                        number of base pairs it covers minus 1. That is, a
                                        block with two variants at positions 2 and 5 has
                                        length 3.

whatshap-variant_per_block_avg.title: Avg Variants per Block
whatshap-variant_per_block_avg.description:
Description of the distribution of non-singleton
                                        block sizes, where the size of a block is the number
                                        of variants it contains. Number of biallelic
                                        variants in the input VCF, but excluding any non-SNV
                                        variants if --only-snvs was used.

whatshap-frac_het_phased.title: % Phased Variants
whatshap-frac_het_phased.description:
Fraction of heterozygous variants
                                          that could be phased.

whatshap-bp_per_block_avg.title: Avg bp per Block
whatshap-bp_per_block_avg.description:
Description of the distribution of non-singleton
                                        block lengths, where the length of a block is the
                                        number of base pairs it covers minus 1. That is, a
                                        block with two variants at positions 2 and 5 has
                                        length 3.

whatshap-block_n50.title: NG50
whatshap-block_n50.description:
The NG50 value of the distribution of the block
                                        lengths. Interleaved blocks are cut in order to
                                        avoid artificially inflating this value.

variants.title: Input Variants
variants.description:
Number of biallelic variants in the input VCF, but
                                        excluding any non-SNV variants if --only-snvs was
                                        used

heterozygous_variants.title: Heterozygous Variants

The number of biallelic, heterozygous variants in
                                        the input VCF. This is a subset of Input Variants.

heterozygous_snvs.title: Heterozygous SNVs

                                        Variants.

phased.title: Phased Variants

                                        a subset of heterozygous_variants. Also, phased +
                                        unphased + singletons = heterozygous_variants.

phased_snvs.title: Phased SNVs
phased_snvs.description:
The number of biallelic, heterozygous SNVs that are
                                        marked as phased in the input VCF. This is a subset
                                        of phased.
